top_comments.comment: So excited about this one!!! Love u guys so much <3

[Verse 1]
There ain't no gold in this river
That I've been washin' my hands in forever
I know there is hope in these waters
But I can't bring myself to swim
When I am drowning in this silence
Baby, let me in

[Chorus]
Go easy on me, baby
I was still a child
Didn't get the chance to
Feel the world around me
I had no time to choose what I chose to do
So go easy on me

[Verse 2]
There ain't no room for things to change
When we are both so deeply stuck in our ways
You can't deny how hard I have tried
I changed who I was to put you both first
But now I give up

[Chorus]
Go easy on mе, baby
I was still a child
Didn't get the chance to
Feel thе world around me
Had no time to choose what I chose to do
So go easy on me

[Bridge]
I had good intentions
And the highest hopes
But I know right now
It probably doesn't even show

[Chorus]
Go easy on me, baby
I was still a child
I didn't get the chance to
Feel the world around me
I had no time to choose what I chose to do
So go easy on me
The only cover that I'm waiting for is a cover from you, good job Alexander

comments_since_last_sample.body: Too fast:( couldn't bring the emotion out
Wow. You are amazing. That breath control...
Have you tried writing your own music????
Damn, you're so good!!! It's unreal how much control you have!!! I'd kill for a voice like that!!!!
a sound worth waiting for, your voice gives peace💜
Wow, amazing! So crazy...feels like yesterday when you had 30.000 subscribers  and I was one of them:o so happy for you reaching somany people with your passion:))
